name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_assay
displayName: Technique used to acquire imagings. If not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_assaykit
displayName: The title of the kit/biologicals used.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_doe
displayName: Date or a period of time when the assay was performed.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_instru
displayName: Device applied for the assay. If not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_sampleid
displayName: Self-defined sample ID(s). Make sure it is the same when entering the sample metadata.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_imgtype
displayName: Type of imagings generated from this experiment and is stored by the metadata provider.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_software
displayName: Software used for processing the imagings.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_signal
displayName: How is the signal generated by this sample.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_channel
displayName: How are individual channels represented in the image.
column5: Green: Megalin, tubular lumen. Red: Laminin, basement membrane

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_dimen
displayName: Volume in pixels: x, y, z, tilts.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_magnifi
displayName: Magnification(s) used to produc imagings in this experiment.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_quality
displayName: If any QC procedure applied for this experiment.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_relvpaper
displayName: Link or DOI of the literature that is relevant to this experiment.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_finddata
displayName: (For metadata provider) Local path, folder name where imagins are store, private repository. (For sharing) Path in shared folder, link to public repository.

name: crc1607_assay_img_v1_askshare
dataverseAlias: Would you like to share these imagings with Z02 or Z05 project?
displayName: Whether to share the imagings with Z02 or Z05 project to develop relevant applications or LLM.
